name: The Bubble Boy Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of Jerry's girlfriend in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Naomi.

	Jerry likes Naomi, but he can't stand her laugh.  On Jerry's answering machine, George mentions that Naomi sounds like Elmer Fudd sitting on a juicer.

questions.text: What country club does Kramer have plans at?
questions.explanation:
Westchester.

	Jerry and George try not to tell Kramer that they're going up north for the weekend because Susan can't stand him.  When Kramer says that he's golfing at the exclusive Westchester Country Club, he tells them that he got in because of his Cuban cigars.

questions.text: What is the bubble boy's first name?
questions.explanation:
Donald.

	After running into Donald's father in Monk's, Jerry and Elaine decide to stop by at the bubble boy's house on the way up to the cabin.  The bubble boy's surname is Sanger.

questions.text: The bubble boy lives in New Hampshire.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The bubble boy actually lives in upstate New York, on the way to the cabin.  George and Susan decide to visit the bubble boy with Jerry, and they end up arriving much earlier.

1947.

	Susan's grandfather built the cabin in 1947, and when Kramer arrives at the cabin, he ends up burning it down with one of the Cuban cigars that he brings.

True.

	Kramer decides to go into Jerry's apartment after his golf game is canceled, and he finds the directions to the cabin.  Soon, Naomi calls and Kramer decides to drive her to the cabin.

questions.text: What does Elaine order at the restaurant that she and Jerry stop at on the way to see the bubble boy?
questions.explanation:
Water.

	The scenes filmed in the diner were filmed on the same set as the ones filmed in Reggie's Diner in the later seasons of the show.  At this point in the episode, Jerry wants something to eat, but Elaine thinks it would be best to go see the bubble boy.

questions.text: Where does Jerry keep his spare photos?
options: In the passenger seat of his car
questions.explanation:
In his trunk.

	At the diner, the waitress remembers seeing Jerry on "The Tonight Show", and Elaine makes Jerry write another lame autograph.  Jerry decides to get revenge by ordering Elaine a full lunch rather than just the water.

questions.text: What game do George and Susan play with the bubble boy?
questions.explanation:
Trivial Pursuit.

	The bubble boy ends up nearing the end of the game, but a misprinted card causes him and George to fight.  George and Susan end up popping the bubble boy's bubble a short time before Jerry and Elaine arrive.

Kramer.

	When Kramer and Naomi arrive at the cabin early, they decide to go swimming.  When they leave, Kramer accidentally leaves his lit Cuban cigar on the mantle and it falls onto some newspapers.  The burnt-down cabin is incorporated in the next episode, "The Cheever Letters".
